name: Timetable Management System

images.caption: View, edit and delete the timetable of courses
Show the details of timetable based on course and semester in complete version
Show the details of timetable based on course and semester in simplified version
Pop colour plate and drop course button when click on the course

description: A timetable Management System for Courses, University and Colleague.||Features:|1. Login system with RECAPTCHA|2. Backend management system |3. Complete and simplified version of table |4. Export as pdf and excel |5. Recolour the table |6. Add drop course||Hosting:|hosting with XAMPP||This is my group final year project when I studying diploma at UNIMY.|At the time, my teammates and I have only basic understanding to the use of languages so luckily that even thought we dont have the concept of frameworks and just copy the codes from google and stackoverflow, yet the website still could run fluently and make the features as planned (except profile system).||After this project end, I backed up the codes yet it has too many copies and I could not ensure the uploaded to github one is the latest. It seems impossible to host no matter in local and online again since messy folder structure and I forgot to backup the DB and sql.
